title: Baltimore-Washington Parkway: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       News- Click here for official press releases of the National Park Service and the Baltimore Washington Parkway.      Photos and Multimedia- Discover the parkway through pictures.         History and Culture- Discover the history of the Baltimore Washington Parkway including Gladys Noon Spellman.      Nature- Click here for Nature      Education- Click here for help for educators         Management- The Greenbelt Park Superintendent is in charge of the operations of Greenbelt Park and the Baltimore Washington Parkway.          The United States Park Police patrol the parkway. Emergencies- 301-344-4250
